.. snorunt:

--------

.. image:: ../../_images/pokemobs/gen_3/entity_icon/textures/snorunts.png

| Snorunt is a ice Pok√©mob.
| Snorunt evolves into :doc:`glalie`:
|  -  At Level 42.
| 
| Snorunt evolves into :doc:`froslass`:
|  -  When female.
|  -  When given a Dawn Stone.
|
